TopicTitle: Rover on Duna randomly spins in 360 degrees

Articles.Content:
I spent an hour today driving the Rover on Duna. The idea is to get to a crater. Buy I also wanted to see how it behaves on terrain. 

 

It's buggy.

-wheels float above Dunas surface

-Randomly hits invisible terrain object in relatively flat terrain and spins in 360 degrees

-refuses to go in a straight line and constantly fighting with maintaining control of velocity

 

Will post a video of this on 3.3.2023
